body:
FWIW,  conda list pandas
```
# packages in environment at C:\Users\212563417\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3:
#
# Name                    Version                   Build  Channel
pandas                    0.23.4           py36h830ac7b_0    defaults
```
Can you try in a new environment?

Working on it. Restarted the kernel and have new error

AttributeError: module 'matplotlib' has no attribute 'artist'

That's a known issue with the latest point release of python and matplotlib / Qt. Try downgrading to python=3.6.6.

Done - thanks. 

More info for those interested: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52979322/matplotlib-3-0-0-cannot-import-name-get-backend-from-matplotlib
